articles.content: Id Software co-founder John Carmack has suggested a novel approach to combat the scourge of scalpers and resellers who are taking advantage of the global shortage of semiconductors: auctioning off ne… [+2282 chars]

articles.author: Lauren Morton
articles.title: Valheim has sold three million copies, on track for world domination soon - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Forget millions, when will it sell billions?
articles.content: Welcome back to another round of big numbers for Valheim, the latest little indie game that could. Iron Gate Studio's survival-y craft-y viking game sold one million copies in its first week, two mil… [+2847 chars]

articles.author: Kunal Khullar
articles.title: Microsoft will release the next version of Office for Windows and Mac later this year - XDA Developers
articles.description: Microsoft has announced two new version of Office both of which will be available in the second half of 2021
articles.content: Microsoft is officially launching two new versions of Office this year: Office 2021 for personal users and Office LTSC (Long Term Servicing Channel) for commercial purposes. Office 2021 will be an up… [+1966 chars]
